scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Charity
scrape.text: I ended up knocking this one out in under 24 hours. I think that had I set it aside for any small bit of time, I probably wouldn't have even finished it...which I'm now thinking would have been preferable. Maybe I'll come back to this review with more detail. Then again, maybe I've wasted enough time on it. Who knows? Who cares?
